Class AgencyBillInvoiceItemView

extends java.lang.Object

      • getPaymentExceptionItemIcon

        public java.lang.String getPaymentExceptionItemIcon()
        Returns:
        name of gif file for displaying a flag icon in the UI next to an invoice item. Red flag if item is currently a payment exception, grey flag if it is not currently an exception but has been an exception in the past
